```dockerfile
FROM node:20-alpine AS frontend-builder
WORKDIR /app
COPY frontend/package.json frontend/package-lock.json ./
RUN npm ci
COPY frontend/ .
RUN npm run build

FROM nginx:1.25-alpine AS frontend
LABEL maintainer="team@example.com"
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="React frontend served by nginx"
RUN addgroup --system appgroup && adduser --system --ingroup appgroup appuser && \
    chown -R appuser:appgroup /var/cache/nginx /var/log/nginx /etc/nginx/conf.d && \
    touch /var/run/nginx.pid && chown appuser:appgroup /var/run/nginx.pid
COPY --from=frontend-builder /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html
EXPOSE 80
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD wget --no-verbose --tries=1 --spider http://localhost:80/ || exit 1
USER appuser
CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]


FROM golang:1.22-alpine AS api-builder
WORKDIR /app
COPY api/go.mod api/go.sum ./
RUN go mod download
COPY api/ .
RUN CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux go build -o /server .

FROM alpine:3.19 AS api
LABEL maintainer="team@example.com"
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="Go API server"
WORKDIR /app
RUN addgroup --system appgroup && adduser --system --ingroup appgroup appuser
COPY --from=api-builder /server ./server
EXPOSE 8080
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD wget --no-verbose --tries=1 --spider http://localhost:8080/healthz || exit 1
USER appuser
CMD ["./server"]


FROM python:3.12-slim AS worker-builder
WORKDIR /app
COPY worker/requirements.txt ./
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --prefix=/install -r requirements.txt

FROM python:3.12-slim AS worker
LABEL maintainer="team@example.com"
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="Python Celery worker"
WORKDIR /app
RUN addgroup --system appgroup && adduser --system --ingroup appgroup appuser
COPY --from=worker-builder /install /usr/local
COPY worker/ .
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD python -c "from celery import Celery; exit(0)" || exit 1
USER appuser
CMD ["celery", "-A", "tasks", "worker", "--loglevel=info"]
